name: Jert's Magic 8 Ball
description:
Jert's Magic 8 ball is a 2D platformer/side scroller where you play as Jert the wizard as you go on an adventure to defeat chance!

Chance can work for or against you by your spells having a chance to back fire!

---

shoot effect: https://freesound.org/people/Bertsz/sounds/524305/

All other assets were made by me or the team.

Hope you enjoy!
